Manual Numbering¶

By default, entries are numbered in the order they’re added to the Encyclopaedia.

However, if you need an entry to have a specific number, you can specify this when creating the entry.

WARNING: This will only work if the number you want to use has not already been automatically assigned. ie: If you have six entries, then for the seventh try to assign it to 4, this will fail.

numbering = EncEntry(

parent=encyclopaedia, name=”Manually Numbering Entries”, text = [

“When creating an entry, the ‘number’ argument can be used to specify what number the entry will have.” ” If it’s not provided then the entry will be automatically assigned the next available number.”, “Numbered entries must be defined before non-numbered entries.”

], subject=”In-Depth”, viewed_persistent=True

)
